text: Marion Marshall (born Marian Lepriel Tanner; June 8, 1929 â€“ September 24, 2018) was an American actress. From 1963 to 1971, she was married to Robert Wagner. From 1952 to 1959, she was married to director Stanley Donen. Marshall's first movie appearances were in the 20th Century Fox movies Gentleman's Agreement and Daisy Kenyon in 1947 (although they were both uncredited). She went on to play roles (many minor) in over 25 more movies until 1967.Marion Marshall profile Marshall had a small but significant role in his I Was a Male War Bride (1949). She was featured in three Martin and Lewis comedy movies, The Stooge, Sailor Beware and That's My Boy, with stars Dean Martin and Jerry Lewis. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Marion Marshall
